original_text: And when he was in distress, he entreated the favor of the Lord his God and humbled himself greatly before the God of his fathers.
korean_text: 그가 환난을 당하여 그의 하나님 여호와께 간구하고 그의 조상들의 하나님 앞에 크게 겸손하여

sentences.original_text: And when he was in distress
he entreated the favor of the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 하나님 주의 은혜를 간청했다

sentences.original_text: and humbled himself greatly before the God of his fathers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 조상의 하나님 앞에서 스스로를 크게 낮추었다
